If you need a working Cannon, please use the CFG inside file BDA, and get BDArmory [here](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/85209-0-25-BDArmory-v0-7-1-1-Dev-Thread-Dec-9)

Normandy SR-2With Mass Effect Drive *coming soon...*

**Edited <time datetime="2015-03-13T03:40:31Z" title="03/13/2015 03:40  AM" data-short="9 yr">March 13, 2015</time> by flywlyx**

Of all the things Mass Effect to model, the Hammerhead? ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Hope yours has more than tissue paper for armor!

BTW, Beautiful model!

WOW!

testing it right now

Update:

I love the M44 nicely done,

 the SX3 throw me out of kerbin at 35621526512m/s at launch

i cannot wait for the SR2!

Do you plan to also make the Mako as well?

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-26T19:19:43Z" title="05/26/2015 07:19  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 26, 2015</time> by S1000RRHP4**
